title: stop suggesting the deprecated "PackageLicenseUrl" in project file intelliSense
body:
`PackageLicenseUrl` has been deprecated in favor of `PackageLicense` - see [4213](https://github.com/dotnet/project-system/issues/4213).

IntelliSense should not offer that option but suggest `PackageLicense`

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16904420/59138109-f3ef4500-893f-11e9-824b-0e78c6795f19.png)

Based on @davkean comment - https://github.com/dotnet/project-system/issues/4903#issuecomment-501118909

nodes.body:
This is controlled here:

https://github.com/microsoft/msbuild/blob/87255d576bcd260dceb8cc52a369564529ac98e7/src/MSBuild/Microsoft.Build.CommonTypes.xsd#L1798-L1802

Would you be interested in sending a PR, @karann-msft?
I wouldn't know what else might need changing. I am going to defer to you to choose someone who is more familiar with this code base.
